name: Cogito, Ergo Sum
simple_desc: When using Skill, there is a chance to launch 1 instance of Follow-up ATK on the target, dealing Imaginary DMG.
desc: When using his Skill, Dr. Ratio has a #2[i]% fixed chance of launching a follow-up attack against his target for 1 time, dealing Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. For each debuff the target enemy has, the fixed chance of launching follow-up attack increases by #3[i]%. If the target enemy is defeated before the follow-up attack triggers, the follow-up attack will be directed at a single random enemy instead.
